text: João Lucas de Almeida Carvalho (born 9 March 1998), commonly known as João Lucas, is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays as a Right back for Flamengo. ==Career== ===Bangu=== João Lucas started his professional career in 2019 at Bangu, he played eight matches in the Campeonato Carioca and called the attention of some bigger clubs. ===Flamengo=== On 9 May 2019 Flamengo signed João Lucas from Bangu for an undisclosed fee. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Bangu |2019 |Carioca |colspan="2"|–||0||0||colspan="2" |–||8Appearance(s) in the Campeonato Carioca.||0||8||0 |- |rowspan="3"|Flamengo |2019 |rowspan="2"|Série A |6||0||0||0||0||0||colspan="2" |–||6||0 |- |2020 |2||0||0||0||1Appearance(s) in Copa Libertadores.||0||5||1||8||1 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !8!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!5!!1!!14!!1 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !8!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!13!!1!!22!!1 |} ;Notes ==Honours== ;Flamengo *Copa Libertadores: 2019 *Recopa Sudamericana: 2020 *Campeonato Brasileiro Série A: 2019 *Supercopa do Brasil: 2020 *Campeonato Carioca: 2020 ==References== ==External links== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Villa Nova Atlético Clube players Category:Goiás Esporte Clube players Category:Bangu Atlético Clube players Category:Clube de Regatas do Flamengo footballers
